snippet: For the second straight playoff series, the Rangers are facing, in the Washington Capitals, an opponent playing just like them.
abstract: New York Rangers are preparing for Game 5 of Eastern Conference semifinals against Washington Capitals; series, which is tied 2-2, has featured diligent defense and shot-blocking from both sides.
lead_paragraph: For the second straight playoff series, the Rangers are facing, in the Washington Capitals, an opponent playing just like them.

headline.seo: For Rangers, a Tight, Hard-Hitting Series Is Nothing New
headline.main: Tight, Hard-Hitting Series Is Nothing New to Rangers
headline.print_headline: Tight, Hard-Hitting Series Is Nothing New to Rangers
